pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference Based on Non-Probability Samples // Statistical inference with non-probability samples when auxiliary information from external sources such as probability samples or population totals or means is available. Details can be found in: Wu et al. (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2019.1677241, Kim et al. (2021) doi:10.1111/rssa.12696, Wu et al. (2023) http s://www150.statcan.gc.ca/n1/pub/12-001-x/2022002/article/00002- eng.htm, Kim et al. (2021) https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/n1/pub/ 12-001-x/2021001/article/00004-eng.htm, Kim et al. (2020) doi:10.1111/rssb.12354.
